mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_COMMENT ( MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_LIKES ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{content}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, C.COMMENT_LIKES FROM T_COMMENT AS C INNER JOIN T_MEMBER AS M ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE C.PRODUCT_ID = #{num};
